member.name: P:Engine.CustomRenderers.LayerRenderer.Rect
member.summary: [GET / SET] The rectangular area the sprite occupies. Relative to the .

member.name: P:Engine.CustomRenderers.LayerRenderer.SharedMaterial
member.summary: [GET / SET] The that is used for rendering the sprite.

member.name: P:Engine.CustomRenderers.LayerRenderer.ColorTint
member.summary: [GET / SET] A color by which the sprite is tinted.

member.name: P:Engine.CustomRenderers.LayerRenderer.RectMode
member.summary: [GET / SET] Specifies how the sprites uv-Coordinates are calculated.

member.name: P:Engine.CustomRenderers.LayerRenderer.Offset
member.summary: [GET / SET] A virtual Z offset that affects the order in which objects are drawn. If you want to assure an object is drawn after another one, just assign a higher Offset value to the background object.

member.name: P:Engine.CustomRenderers.LayerRenderer.VertexZOffset
member.summary: [GET] The internal Z-Offset added to the renderers vertices based on its value.

member.name: T:Engine.CustomRenderers.LayerRenderer.UVMode
member.summary: SPecifies, how the sprites uv-Coordinates are calculated.

member.name: F:Engine.CustomRenderers.LayerRenderer.UVMode.Stretch
member.summary: The uv-Coordinates are constant, stretching the supplied texture to fit the SpriteRenderers dimensions.

member.name: F:Engine.CustomRenderers.LayerRenderer.UVMode.WrapHorizontal
member.summary: The u-Coordinate is calculated based on the available horizontal space, allowing the supplied texture to be tiled across the SpriteRenderers width.

member.name: F:Engine.CustomRenderers.LayerRenderer.UVMode.WrapVertical
member.summary: The v-Coordinate is calculated based on the available vertical space, allowing the supplied texture to be tiled across the SpriteRenderers height.

member.name: F:Engine.CustomRenderers.LayerRenderer.UVMode.WrapBoth
member.summary: The uv-Coordinates are calculated based on the available space, allowing the supplied texture to be tiled across the SpriteRenderers size.
